society_member.title: Society Members
features: View all your residences across various societies and cities
View your monthly dues with proper breakup of costs and available funds
Message admins of issues being faced or get notifications from them.

rent_seeker.title: Looking for Rents or looking to buy one?
features: Check out the adverts published by authenticated valid landlords or societies about availability, as suitable to your budget and dream location

problem.text: Different countries with same problem: Hidden expense management without clear visibility of costs and funds.

goal.text: Our goal is to provide detailed breakup of dynamically calculated monthly pricing to your knowledge.

philosophy.text: We do feel strongly that expense reduced or increased should make the contributions vary, not fixed. Also, different expenses need different way of distribution across residences.

peer_services.text: Along the way, our system allows you to create or find geo located ads from valid member of users, bypassing middle men. Next time reach out peer to peer for any services within your area of interest without overpaying!
